Wane

status released
date 2023
platform Windows
role art programming design

Key art.

Wane is a point and click adventure game we made for our third capstone. Learning from the lessons from our previous game, we decided to do another point and click adventure game but in another direction.

This time we were only a two man team and I did all the art, and a lot of programming and design.

Trailer.
